languages.text: Чудовищные устройства, созданные рубить, разрывать в клочья и сжигать своих жертв, хоть и застали бойцов врасплох, но были обезврежены прежде, чем отряд понес существенные потери. На мрачном корабле обнаружилось несколько занятных ксеносских технологий, но никакой информации о том, для чего их владельцы прибыли в систему Райкад.

traits.locale_text: Чудовищные устройства, созданные рубить, разрывать в клочья и сжигать своих жертв, хоть и застали бойцов врасплох, но были обезврежены прежде, чем отряд понес существенные потери. На мрачном корабле обнаружилось несколько занятных ксеносских технологий, но никакой информации о том, для чего их владельцы прибыли в систему Райкад.

languages.text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.
languages.original_text: Чудовищные устройства, созданные рубить, разрывать в клочья и сжигать своих жертв, хоть и застали бойцов врасплох, но были обезврежены прежде, чем отряд понес существенные потери. На мрачном корабле обнаружилось несколько занятных ксеносских технологий, но никакой информации о том, для чего их владельцы прибыли в систему Райкад.

traits.locale_text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralized before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xeno-tech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

languages.text: 那些用来剁碎、撕裂和焚烧受害者的骇人装置让士兵们措手不及，但幸运的是，他们及时摧毁了那些装置，小队并没有遭受太大的损失。士兵们在这艘邪恶的虚空舰上发现了某些古怪的异形技术碎片，但没有发现任何线索，解释这艘飞船为什么会出现在莱卡德星系。
languages.original_text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: 那些用来剁碎、撕裂和焚烧受害者的骇人装置让士兵们措手不及，但幸运的是，他们及时摧毁了那些装置，小队并没有遭受太大的损失。士兵们在这艘邪恶的虚空舰上发现了某些古怪的异形技术碎片，但没有发现任何线索，解释这艘飞船为什么会出现在莱卡德星系。

languages.text: 犠牲者を切り刻み、引き裂き、焼却するように設計された怪物のような仕掛けは、兵士たちの意表を突いたが、部隊が大きな損害を被る前に無力化された。兵士たちは不気味なヴォイドシップから複数の奇妙な異星技術の破片を発見したが、なぜそれがライカド星系にあるのかを解明できるようなデータはなかった。
languages.original_text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: 犠牲者を切り刻み、引き裂き、焼却するように設計された怪物のような仕掛けは、兵士たちの意表を突いたが、部隊が大きな損害を被る前に無力化された。兵士たちは不気味なヴォイドシップから複数の奇妙な異星技術の破片を発見したが、なぜそれがライカド星系にあるのかを解明できるようなデータはなかった。

languages.text: Unos monstruosos artilugios diseñados para triturar, desgarrar e incinerar a sus víctimas sorprendieron a los soldados, pero fueron neutralizados antes de que el escuadrón sufriera pérdidas significativas. Los soldados encontraron varias piezas curiosas de xenotecnología en la siniestra nave del vacío, pero ningún dato que pudiera arrojar algo de luz sobre el motivo de su llegada al Sistema Rykad.
languages.original_text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: Unos monstruosos artilugios diseñados para triturar, desgarrar e incinerar a sus víctimas sorprendieron a los soldados, pero fueron neutralizados antes de que el escuadrón sufriera pérdidas significativas. Los soldados encontraron varias piezas curiosas de xenotecnología en la siniestra nave del vacío, pero ningún dato que pudiera arrojar algo de luz sobre el motivo de su llegada al Sistema Rykad.

languages.text: Grauenhafte Vorrichtungen, die dazu dienten, ihre Opfer zu zerstückeln, zu zerreißen und einzuäschern, überraschten die Soldaten. Die Fallen wurden jedoch neutralisiert, bevor der Trupp nennenswerte Verluste erlitt. Die Soldaten fanden auf dem düsteren Raumschiff mehrere merkwürdige Xenotech-Objekte, jedoch keinerlei Daten, die erklären würden, wie es in das Rykad-System gekommen war.
languages.original_text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: Grauenhafte Vorrichtungen, die dazu dienten, ihre Opfer zu zerstückeln, zu zerreißen und einzuäschern, überraschten die Soldaten. Die Fallen wurden jedoch neutralisiert, bevor der Trupp nennenswerte Verluste erlitt. Die Soldaten fanden auf dem düsteren Raumschiff mehrere merkwürdige Xenotech-Objekte, jedoch keinerlei Daten, die erklären würden, wie es in das Rykad-System gekommen war.

languages.text: Des appareils monstrueux conçus pour déchiqueter, hacher menu et incinérer leurs victimes prennent les soldats au dépourvu avant d'être neutralisés juste à temps pour éviter de lourdes pertes. Les hommes découvrent à bord du sinistre vaisseau d'étranges dispositifs xénotechnologiques, mais pas la moindre information susceptible d'expliquer sa venue dans le système Rykad.
languages.original_text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: Des appareils monstrueux conçus pour déchiqueter, hacher menu et incinérer leurs victimes prennent les soldats au dépourvu avant d'être neutralisés juste à temps pour éviter de lourdes pertes. Les hommes découvrent à bord du sinistre vaisseau d'étranges dispositifs xénotechnologiques, mais pas la moindre information susceptible d'expliquer sa venue dans le système Rykad.

languages.text: Kurbanları doğramak, parçalamak ve yakmak üzere tasarlanmış korkunç mekanizmalar, askerleri gafil avladıktan sonra çok da büyük kayıplar verilmeden etkisiz hâle getiriliyor. Askerler, uğursuz uçsuz gemisinde birkaç ilginç zeno teknolojisi buluyor ancak Rykad Sistemi'ne neden geldiğine dair herhangi bir veriye ulaşamıyor.
languages.original_text: Monstrous contraptions designed to mince, rip apart, and incinerate their victims took the soldiers by surprise but were neutralised before the squad suffered significant losses. The soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.
